2.1.1/string> File http://www.bergstrand.org/brian/software/bin/iscrobbler.2.1.1.dmg MinFoundationVer 567.28 MinSysVer 10.4.9 Notes
English - Bug Fix: If the user name and/or password are changed, iScrobbler will re-handshake. - Bug Fix: Check for and don't allow an empty user name in the prefs window.
